name: Paper Golem
languages: Understands the languages of its creator but can't speak
resist: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine.
conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

trait.name: False Appearance
text: While the paper golem remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary sheet of paper.

trait.name: Immutable Form
text: The paper golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Ink Blot (Recharge 46)
text: As a bonus action, the paper golem applies ink to itself. The next time it hits a creature with a paper cut attack, the creature must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 5 (2d4) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
text: The paper golem's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Paper Cut
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.
